headline: SEC sued over Ethereum, crypto firm asks court to state token is not a security

headline: Bitcoin struggles to regain momentum after weekend wipeout erased more than 10%

headline: Bitcoin 'halving' will cost crypto miners $10 billion a year in lost revenue and 'could well determine who comes out ahead and who gets left behind'
description: Around April 20, the halving will cut the amount of Bitcoin that “miners” can earn each day for validating transactions to 450 from 900 now.

headline: Instagram influencer ‘Jay Mazini’ who swindled millions in crypto scheme that preyed on Muslims sentenced to 7 years in jail
description: Former Instagram influencer “Jay Mazini” who swindled millions of dollars from online followers and a network of Muslims was sentenced to seven years in prison.

headline: Lacking access to mainland Chinese investors, Hong Kong’s crypto ETFs will be ‘nickels and dimes’ compared with U.S. versions
description: Hong Kong’s ETF market is worth about $50 billion, compared with $8.87 trillion in the U.S.

headline: Venture capital continues Web3 retreat, but Q1 hints at a changing tide

description: "He has never been interested in praise, and has always deflected it," Barbara Fried wrote of SBF as she pleaded for a lenient sentence.

description: This “buy AI now, figure it out if it works later" mode is the very mindset that could put sustainable AI innovation in jeopardy.

headline: Rich Americans' spending is driving the U.S. economy—and likely leading the Fed to delay interest rate cuts
